Package edu.rpi.cs.csci4963.u20.hek2liaoy3wangy58yaol4.project.ChineseChess

Class Position

java.lang.Object
edu.rpi.cs.csci4963.u20.hek2liaoy3wangy58yaol4.project.ChineseChess.Position
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
public class Position
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
this class implements a "position" on the Chinese chess board that allows the user to place a piece on that
See Also:
